metadata.title: CVE-2016-6336 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.23.15, 1.26.x before 1.26.4, and 1.27.x before 1.27.1allows remote authenticated users with undelete permissions to bypassintended suppressrevision and deleterevision restrictions and remove therevision deletion status of arbitrary file revisions by usingSpecial:Undelete.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
